name: Hermitcrabs Technologies
description:
Hermitcrabs is a global collective of designers, technologists and strategists. We create experiences that transform brands, grow businesses and make people's life better.
We truly believe on the idea that the principles of user experience should drive not just design, but business and marketing as well. We approach each project with the same curiosity we had when we were kids, just with a bit more experience, method and precision. We mix creativity, usability and millions of lines of code to harmonize the things clients need with what users really want in order to create experiences that change industries.
We are a Singapore based creative agency that the digital world won over early on. Since then we've been creating user friendly digital designs ranging from web to mobile.
We find great interest in all new technologies and latest design practices and with a strong technical team, we take ideas and turn them into a successful products that users enjoy.
